result.eng: The meal is on the table.
result.ga: Tá an béile ar an tábla
result.orig: Tá an béile ar an tábla
result.html: Tá an béile ar an táblaThe meal is on the table.
result.ponchtml: Tá an béile ar an táblaThe meal is on the table.

result.eng: Would you mind helping me to move this table?
result.ga: Ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadh
result.orig: Ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadh
result.html: Ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadhWould you mind helping me to move this table?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a ḃogaḋWould you mind helping me to move this table?

result.eng: Put the cup on the table.
result.ga: Cuir an cupán ar an tábla
result.orig: Cuir an cupán ar an tábla
result.html: Cuir an cupán ar an táblaPut the cup on the table.
result.ponchtml: Cuir an cupán ar an táblaPut the cup on the table.

result.html: Cuir ar an bhord éPut it on the table.
result.ponchtml: Cuir ar an ḃord éPut it on the table.

result.eng: He left a note on the table.
result.ga: D'fhág sé nóta ar an tábla
result.orig: D'fhág sé nóta ar an tábla
result.html: D'fhág sé nóta ar an táblaHe left a note on the table.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sé nóta ar an táblaHe left a note on the table.

result.eng: You will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.
result.ga: Gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhair
result.orig: Gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhair
result.html: Gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhairYou will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.
result.ponchtml: Ġeoḃaiḋ tú clár na n-áḃar ag tús an leaḃairYou will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.

result.eng: The child is under the table.
result.html: Tá an páiste faoin táblaThe child is under the table.
result.ponchtml: Tá an páiste faoin táblaThe child is under the table.

result.eng: We are seated at the table.
result.ga: Tá muid inár suí ag an tábla
result.orig: Tá muid inár suí ag an tábla
result.html: Tá muid inár suí ag an táblaWe are seated at the table.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid inár suí ag an táblaWe are seated at the table.

result.html: Tá sé faoin bhordIt is under the table.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé faoin ḃordIt is under the table.

result.eng: Maybe you can play ping-pong (table tennis) in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go mbeidh tú in ann leadóg bhoird a imirt in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain
result.orig: B'fhéidir go mbeidh tú in ann leadóg bhoird a imirt in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain
result.html: B'fhéidir go mbeidh tú in ann leadóg bhoird a imirt in Áras Mháirtín Uí ChadhainMaybe you can play ping-pong (table tennis) in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go mbeiḋ tú in ann leadóg ḃoird a imirt in Áras Ṁáirtín Uí ĊaḋainMaybe you can play ping-pong (table tennis) in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain.

result.eng: You can play table tennis here.
result.ga: Is féidir leat leadóg bhoird a imirt anseo
result.orig: Is féidir leat leadóg bhoird a imirt anseo
result.html: Is féidir leat leadóg bhoird a imirt anseoYou can play table tennis here.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat leadóg ḃoird a imirt anseoYou can play table tennis here.

result.html: Cuirfidh mé bord in áiritheI'll book a table.
result.ponchtml: Cuirfiḋ mé bord in áiriṫeI'll book a table.

result.eng: I kept that pile of papers in the corner of my table.
result.ga: Choinnigh mé an ceap páipéir sin ar chúinne an bhoird
result.orig: Choinnigh mé an ceap páipéir sin ar chúinne an bhoird
result.html: Choinnigh mé an ceap páipéir sin ar chúinne an bhoirdI kept that pile of papers in the corner of my table.
result.ponchtml: Ċoinniġ mé an ceap páipéir sin ar ċúinne an ḃoirdI kept that pile of papers in the corner of my table.

result.eng: He dropped a newspaper on the table.
result.ga: D'fhág sé páipéar nuachta as a láimh ar an tábla
result.orig: D'fhág sé páipéar nuachta as a láimh ar an tábla
result.html: D'fhág sé páipéar nuachta as a láimh ar an táblaHe dropped a newspaper on the table.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sé páipéar nuaċta as a láiṁ ar an táblaHe dropped a newspaper on the table.
